page.title: 04ROSSENDALE GROUNDWORK
page.content: {THE ROSSENDALE GROUNDWORKERS {ASSOCIATION}help young children and Adults to learn the skills of _{DRY {STONEWALLING TREE PLANTING {RIVERCLEARING WALKS ETC }Rossendale ground workes help young people and old to do farming skilles. If you wanted to you could go on a course for a weekend.You could all so do some work in the town for a weekend to.They work in partnership with {ROSSENDALE {GROUNDWORK TRUST}which was established on the initiative of the Secretary of State for the Environment,by the Country commission.The Trust is supported by the{ROSSENDALE BOROUGH {COUNCIL,}Lancashire County Council and the North West Water Authority. CAN YOU GIVE US SOME OF YOUR TIME MUSCLE AND ENTHUSIASM TO CONSERVE OUR Environment.TEL.211421
